掀.definition: to lift (a lid); to rock; to convulse

掀動.definition: to stir; to lift; to set sth in motion

掀翻.definition: to turn sth over; to overturn

掀起.definition: to lift; to raise (a lid etc); (of a storm) to surge; to stir up (waves etc); (fig.) to trigger; set off (a wave of popularity, a controversy etc)

掀開.definition: to lift open; to tear open

掀風鼓浪.definition: to raise a storm; to stir up trouble; to instigate
